content.raw: There are a few minor style suggestions in [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branches/compare/swig_caguero%0Dswig#diff) branch. Feel free to merge if reasonable. `rubocop` is a static code checker that we can integrate in a future pull request. If you run it, it shows quite a few warnings already but I don't think this is important at this point.
content.html: There are a few minor style suggestions in this branch. Feel free to merge if reasonable. rubocop is a static code checker that we can integrate in a future pull request. If you run it, it shows quite a few warnings already but I don't think this is important at this point.
